summary: A documentary biopic about Eric Kandel, Nobel Prize winner and one of the most important neural scientists of the 20th century.
cast: Eric Kandel|Josh Dudman|Heinz Fischer|Markus Giefing|Denise Kandel|Emily Kandel|Yvonne Kandel|Angelika Kropej|Sandra Littomericzky|Juan Marcos|Viktoria Müller|Wolfgang Pampel|Konstantin Petricek|Emanuel Schierl|Friedrich Schwardtmann|Nina Strehlein|Albert Stunkard
title: Auf der Suche nach dem Gedächtnis
